New Records: Florian Wirtz scored the fastest-ever goal for Germany seven seconds into the game against France.
Key Match Events: Florian Wirtz scored Germany's fastest-ever goal seven seconds into the game.
Kai Havertz made it 2-0 after the break.
Antonio Rüdiger produced a late goalline clearance.
Marc-André ter Stegen denied Kylian Mbappé in a one-on-one situation.
Pre-Game Insights: Toni Kroos returned from international retirement for the upcoming European Championship.
Post-Match Reflections: The German national team raised hopes that they can excel on home ground at Euro 2024.
France were whistled derisively by the home fans at full time.
It was Germany’s second consecutive victory over France, giving Julian Nagelsmann a timely boost.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Stuttgart’s Maximilian Mittelstädt started at left-back on his debut.
Bayer Leverkusen’s Robert Andrich impressed in just his second cap.
Germany showed bite and commitment as the visitors bossed the opening 20 minutes.
